entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 early this evening then light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 08 January 2023
